name: scope.js
description: A tool for handling data transformations

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --report html _mocha -- --recursive -R spec -r should tests && open coverage/index.html
scripts.complexity: rm -rf complexity && mkdir complexity && plato -r -d complexity lib && open complexity/index.html
scripts.complexity-simple: rm -rf complexity.* && find lib/ | grep .js | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/jsc --report complexity.json

author: Jacob Mather
